name: Donut
description: A soft and sweet fried dough ring, glazed and perfect with your morning coffee.

name: Hotteok
description: Korean pancake filled with brown sugar, cinnamon, and nuts – sweet and chewy.

name: Maqshush
description: A Saudi Arabian crispy pancake with date syrup and ghee – a beloved local treat.

name: Panini
description: Grilled sandwich with meats, cheese, and veggies on artisan bread – warm and filling.

name: Pão de Queijo
description: Brazilian cheese bread, crispy outside and chewy inside, made with tapioca flour.

name: Pastel
description: Fried Brazilian pastry stuffed with cheese or meat – crispy, hot, and savory.
